original_text: As soon as Solomon had finished building the house of the Lord and the king's house and all that Solomon desired to build,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 건축하기를 마치며 자기가 이루기를 원하던 모든 것을 마친 때에

sentences.original_text: As soon as Solomon had finished building the house of the Lord
and all that Solomon desired to build,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 솔로몬이 건축하고자 했던 모든 것
